resources.string: Welcome to DMS \nWhere you maintain your \nCredit score
Let’s check whether you \nHave an account
Hey there! We love new \nCustomers let’s get to know you
Please fill in the following details
We would like to make sure \nYour account is safe & secure
Select and answer some of the security questions
We’ve sent a verification code to +2547123***78
Lets settle your loan and borrow within your limits for \nyou. Select one of the loan companies that you have \na loan with
Sucks to forget your pin! Don’t \nworry we got you
Please answer the security question below
This may take a while please bear with us….
Hold on as we check if you \nqualify
Hurray you qualify for a us \nTo repay your loan
We’ve successfully settled your loan and borrowed on your \nBehalf and deposited the new borrowing in to your wallet. \nGo home and check your wallet balance.
Oops you don’t qualify for a \nFull amount, top up to repay \nyour loan in full

We need you to allow DMS to borrow another loan upon settling your existing loan with a slight charge from accessing our services, your existing loan will be settled and borrowed again on your behalf. 

With your permission and consent we will only borrow within your loan limits and also have a percentage charge of 10% on your current loan. 

Upon your consent we will notify the third party application that you have granted us permission to borrow on your behalf and they will send you a notification when we make the borrowing on your behalf. 

You may choose to revoke this consent prior to us borrowing the loan by deregistering your loan at anytime or you can send us a request to delete the loan registered but this will be possible only 24hrs before we settle the loan. 

Once we clear the loan you will deal with the loan application that you took your loan and our agreement will be terminated upon settling and re-borrowing. 

We will not share or disclose your loan status to any third parties other than your loan application without your consent. 

Please read full Data privacy policy
I consent to giving DMS permission to borrow on \nmy behalf upon settling of my existing loan
